## Test Multi-variate Lasso distribution 
```{r}
library(here)
source(here("code","lasso_distribution","Multi-Lasso.R")) 

A = matrix(c(2,0,0,3),2,2)
b = matrix(c(-2,1),2,1)

```



```{r}
library(pracma)
fun <- function(x,y)
{
  A = matrix(c(2,0,0,3),2,2)
  b = matrix(c(-2,1),2,1)
  c = 3
  vx = matrix(c(x,y),2,1)
  return(exp((-0.5*t(vx)%*%A%*%vx + t(b)%*%vx-  c*norm(vx,"1"))[1]))
}
xmin <- 0; xmax <- 50
ymin <- 0; ymax <- 50

# Normalizing constant
integral2(fun, xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
```
